data.title: 24 Iconic Quotes from “Mean Girls”
data.meta_description: “Mean Girls,” the cult classic teen comedy film, has left an indelible mark on pop culture since its release in 2004. Filled with memorable characters, witty dialogue, and timeless lessons, the movie…
data.text:
“Mean Girls,” the cult classic teen comedy film, has left an indelible mark on pop culture since its release in 2004. Filled with memorable characters, witty dialogue, and timeless lessons, the movie continues to resonate with audiences of all ages. Beyond its comedic brilliance, “Mean Girls” offers a treasure trove of inspirational quotes that serve as guiding principles for navigating the complexities of life. From messages of self-confidence and empowerment to lessons in friendship and resilience, these quotes are not just lines from a movie but words to live by. Join us as we explore 50 iconic and inspirational quotes from “Mean Girls” that are sure to make your day.

“You go, Glen Coco!” — Damian

“Ex-boyfriends are just off-limits to friends. That’s just, like, the rules of feminism.” — Gretchen Wieners

“That is so fetch!” — Gretchen Wieners

“Grool… I meant to say great, and then I started to say cool.” — Cady Heron

“Don’t have sex. You will get pregnant and die.” — Coach Carr

“The greatest people you will ever meet are all a little bit crazy.” — Janis Ian

“Whatever, I’m getting cheese fries.” — Regina George
